variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study participant SHARe ID number

variable.name: exam
variable.comment: The EXAM variable was assigned by comparing the foot study call back exam date (EXDATE) and the Framingham Heart Study exam date (data not in this dataset). The EXAM variable is the FHS exam cycle that is the closest, by date, to the foot study call back exam date.

variable.name: FOOTPAIN
variable.description: Presence of foot pain (on most days of the month, from foot study questionnaire)

variable.name: HEELATRO
variable.comment: Data are missing when a participant attended the exam but did not obtain the foot exam by the foot study clinician for this data item.

variable.name: FOREATRO
variable.comment: Data are missing when a participant attended the exam but did not obtain the foot exam by the foot study clinician for this data item.

variable.name: lesstoe
variable.comment: Data are missing when a participant attended the exam but did not obtain the foot exam by the foot study clinician for this data item.

variable.name: pesplan
variable.comment: Data are missing when a participant attended the exam but did not obtain the foot pressure scans (TekScan MatScan obtained on the right and left foot). This data was not obtained because either the participant did not receive the foot pressure scan (63), or were seen on days when the foot pressure scan device was not working (49), or the data was poor quality (15).

variable.name: exdate
variable.description: Date of foot study call back exam
